this_title: Around the World in Eighty Days Season 1
trans_title: 环游世界八十天 第一季
introduction: To marry Belinda Maze and win a 20, 000 pound bet with her father, Phileas Fogg must journey around the world in 80 days. To help him is his servant Passepartout. Hindering them at every turn is Mr. Fix, hired by Maze's father to stop him.
chinese_title: 环游世界八十天 第一季
foreign_title: Around the World in Eighty Days Season 1
